name: Dental Implant
description: I provide Dental Implant. A dental implant is an artificial tooth root that's placed into your jaw to hold a prosthetic tooth or bridge. Feel free to book. Thank you.

name: Teeth Braces
description: Braces are dental tools that help correct problems with your teeth, like crowding, crooked teeth, or teeth that are out of alignment. Thank you.

name: Teeth Whitening
description: Now days peoples are suffering from teeth affecting. I am providing the Teeth Whitening Service at low cost. Feel free to visit & contact me.Thank a lot.

name: Dental Surgery
description: If you need dental surgery you can contact. I have 10 years of experience of dental surgery. Thank you. Don't forget to visit me.

name: Root Canal
description: I also provide Root Canal Service.Its a dental procedure involving the removal of the soft center of the tooth, the pulp.You can visit me.

name: Teeth Prosthesis
description: Prosthesis is recommended when the lack of teeth is extensive or if the position of the teeth or the quality of the jaw bone.
